name: Blueprint Word: Classroom
description: Blueprint Word: Classroom - Continuation of an exciting puzzle where you need to make a certain word using all possible mechanisms.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: 2.0GHz processor or faster Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 180 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: 2.0GHz processor or faster Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA or AMD dedicated graphics with 512MB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 180 MB available space
